summary: ↳ got au // sansa and jeyne escape kings landing together they don’t talk about how sansa was to be a queen, or how jeyne used...
caption:
↳ got au // sansa and jeyne escape kings landing together

they don’t talk about how sansa was to be a queen, or how jeyne used to sigh over the boys in the training yard. they don’t talk about how neither of them looked back when they clasped sweaty, shaking hands and ran from the kingsguard. they don’t talk about a lot of things but that doesn’t mean they don’t talk. their nights are spent curled around one another as bedmates, huddled together for warmth like they were still girls and they were still safe in winterfell instead of here in this desolate place. at night they didn’t need to worry about food or coin. the nights were for them. and sometimes, in her heart of hearts, jeyne thinks that there’s nothing in the world worth worrying about when her legs are entwined with sansa’s and the other girl’s breath warms her face as they whisper secrets to one another in the dark.

summary: It was just confirmed that the writers intentionally set up parallels between the Lannisters going to Winterfell in the first...
body: It was just confirmed that the writers intentionally set up parallels between the Lannisters going to Winterfell in the first episode of the series and Daenerys and her army going to Winterfell in the first episode of the last season. They are really not holding back with all these subtle hints that Daenerys will act like more and more of an antagonist this season. We’re really going to get the ‘’the Starks have no choice but to ally themselves with an untrustworthy family that will become a problem to them later on’’ plotline. The power that that has. We have Sansa hugging Jon while glaring at the unwanted company (Ned wasn’t too keen on the Lannisters presence), we have Sansa being courteous to people she would rather not interact with (Ned/Cat with the Lannisters) and we have Arya looking giddily at her soon to be enemies. However, this time, unlike the last time, the Starks will prevail. House Stark rights y’all!

We’re really going to get the ‘’the Starks have no choice but to ally themselves with an untrustworthy family that will become a problem to them later on’’ plotline. The power that that has. However, this time, unlike the last time, the Starks will prevail. House Stark rights y’all!

We’re really going to get the ‘’the Starks have no choice but to ally themselves with an untrustworthy family that will become a problem to them later on’’ plotline. The power that that has. We have Sansa hugging Jon while glaring at the unwanted company (Ned wasn’t too keen on the Lannisters presence), we have Sansa being courteous to people she would rather not interact with (Ned/Cat with the Lannisters) and we have Arya looking giddily at her soon to be enemies. tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary: ❝To my dearest friend❞  Dear Sansa, We were happy, me and you. There was a time when we were happy together.   May we meet...
body:
❝To my dearest friend❞ 

Dear Sansa,

We were happy, me and you. There was a time when we were happy together. 

May we meet meet again.

I keep you safe and sound in my heart.

Don’t die too far from me.

Always yours,

Jeyne Poole.

—— Sansa & Jeyne aesthetic - Jeyne writing letters she’ll never send to Sansa |  © caption by me.

blog.name: jonryamanips

An Edit Account For Game Of Thrones
replies by seanscowgirl 🌼

summary:
Arya: *sees a presumably extinct species and is understandably awestruck*
Dany Stans: SHE'S GONNA LICK DANY'S BOOTS AND FORGET...
body:
Arya: *sees a presumably extinct species and is understandably awestruck*

Dany Stans: SHE’S GONNA LICK DANY’S BOOTS AND FORGET THE HORRIBLE THINGS SHES DONE COZ GIANT LIZARD BOI!!!

Are y'all dumb or what? She’s seeing a Dragon for the first time that doesn’t mean shit. She’s smiling at Drogon not Daenerys.

And the whole “Arya loves Targaryens.” argument is pathetic. She loves VISENYA Targaryen and what’s the one thing Arya hates? People who kill unjustly and commit horrendous crimes, ie Dany.

D&D said Arya And Sansa would be hostile towards Daenerys and now y'all are cumming over Arya smiling at a lizard and saying she’s gonna “worship the ground Dany walks on.” I’m fucking sorry, but Arya doesn’t exist just to praise and worship your fave pyromaniac.

summary: The one of the worst things that the show left out from the Books is a part of Sansa’s arch that I call “secret agent Sansa”....
body: The one of the worst things that the show left out from the Books is a part of Sansa’s arch that I call “secret agent Sansa”. Sansa being given a note and meeting in the gods wood with Ser Dantos and being involved in her escape. When Sansa for the first time was able to try to get agency over her own life and despite the fact that it could be a trap was a huge thing to me. She took a huge risk meeting him and she knew this but her freedom outweighed that for her this to me took a huge amount of bravery and cunning to hide this from everyone including her husband. I feel like this story arch being used in the show would have been great for her character and it is sad we never got it.

blog.name: hypomone535
blog.title: Dream of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
I am a Stark of Winterfell

I am a writer of Jonsa

body:
Not Like the Songs

A northern wolf and hidden dragon

Nothing sweeter to imagine

A bursting tale of deep desire,

This their song of ice and fire…

Once King of the North

Now heir of the realm entire

Once the sword in the darkness

A mix of ice and of fire

And I the dragon could rule the realm

And she my wolf the northern helm

And in my bed the stars outshine

For I am hers and she is mine

And I the wolf that prowls the night

And he my dragon strong in flight

And in my heart the sun succumbs

For across the land winter comes

A northern wolf a hidden dragon

Nothing sweeter to imagine

A bursting tale of deep desire

This our song of ice and fire.

🔥❄️🐺

summary: People focus too much on the battle with the NK. I think this will be the final battle, before there will be the war of the...
question: People focus too much on the battle with the NK. I think this will be the final battle, before there will be the war of the three queens. So many focus on Jon being the rightful king, but it's Sansa who will become QITN. Jon will alienate Dany by betraying her love, Cersei will kidnap Sansa and there we have the wars between them. And of course Sansa will be present on the battlefields. It's needed for morale, hence the armour. Jon ein the rightful heir will only matter to Dany, not the others.
answer: I think the NK battle happens first because the actor gave an interview and basically hinted at it. I also think Sansa will be offered the crown but she’ll refuse or keep it ambiguous so that the Northerners are satisfied and Dany doesn’t leave. Sansa will be the principal power in the North until the NK dies in which case you’ll have a power struggle between the Starks, Daenerys and Cersei which is when the kidnapping happens but I wonder if it’s just going to be Cersei acting as an antagonist. D&D have been invested in Cersei, subverting expectation. Each time we think she’s done, she does something unexpected and gains power. The kidnapping is unexpected but how does it help her? I think the Starks and Cersei will form an alliance against Daenerys as she is the most powerful one especially if the Golden Company jumps ship and fights with Jon.

I think the Starks and Cersei will form an alliance against Daenerys as she is the most powerful one especially if the Golden Company jumps ship and fights with Jon.

summary: and at the end of it all, there you were Daenerys smiled wryly. "I'm sure it must be odd for your people, to have two queens in...
body:
and at the end of it all, there you were

Daenerys smiled wryly. “I’m sure it must be odd for your people, to have two queens in a single castle. I understand. I do not intend to take your throne from you, Queen Sansa, you have my word on that.”

“I don’t doubt that, your grace.” Trust forged in the wars for humanity was an odd thing, unbreakable in some senses, yet delicate in others.

–

When the fires stop burning, when the snow begins to fall anew, two women are left standing. Alone, they are fearsome. But together, they just might begin to heal.

day one of asoiafrarepairs week: ashes/ snowflakes - dany x sansa

read on ao3

and at the end of it all, there you were

Daenerys smiled wryly. “I’m sure it must be odd for your people, to have two queens in a single castle. I understand. I do not intend to take your throne from you, Queen Sansa, you have my word on that.”

“I don’t doubt that, your grace.” Trust forged in the wars for humanity was an odd thing, unbreakable in some senses, yet delicate in others.

–

When the fires stop burning, when the snow begins to fall anew, two women are left standing. Alone, they are fearsome. But together, they just might begin to heal.

day one of asoiafrarepairs week: ashes/ snowflakes - dany x sansa

read on ao3

«It is probable that falling in love was the most important thing that they ever accomplished, and they accomplished a number of quite important things..»

summary:
Sansa: My girlfriend must be the best on her field. Organized, polite, graceful, a real fighter..
Dany: Hey. This is Targaryen,...
body:
Sansa: My girlfriend must be the best on her field. Organized, polite, graceful, a real fighter..

Dany: Hey. This is Targaryen, Daenerys Targ- [trips, falls on her face bringing a table’s content to the floor and spills her coffee everywhere]

Sansa: That one. I want that one.

summary:
“The snow drifted down and down, all in ghostly silence, and lay thick 
and unbroken on the ground. It was a place of whites and...
caption:
“The snow drifted down and down, all in ghostly silence, and lay thick and unbroken on the ground. It was a place of whites and blacks and greys. White towers and white snow and white statues, black shadows and black trees, the dark grey sky above. A pure world, Sansa thought. I do not belong here. Yet she stepped out all the same.”

@asoiafrarepairs Week | Snowflakes | Day 1

summary: I love how the ‘dumbest’ Sansa ever was basically her wanting a good marriage after her parents arranged it. Many characters...
body: I love how the ‘dumbest’ Sansa ever was basically her wanting a good marriage after her parents arranged it. Many characters wish they were that dumb, including some of my favourites. If wanting to be happy and enjoying life is the lowest they ever got, then Theon wouldn’t have suffered years of torture and Stannis wouldn’t be dead (he didn’t have his supplies guarded and he sacrificed his daughter for slightly warmer temperature), Cersei wouldn’t have lost her son (after arming the Faith Militant), etc.

Many characters wish they were that dumb, including some of my favourites. If wanting to be happy and enjoying life is the lowest they ever got, then Theon wouldn’t have suffered years of torture and Stannis wouldn’t be dead (he didn’t have his supplies guarded and he sacrificed his daughter for slightly warmer temperature), Cersei wouldn’t have lost her son (after arming the Faith Militant), etc.
trail.content: I love how the ‘dumbest’ Sansa ever was basically her wanting a good marriage after her parents arranged it. Many characters wish they were that dumb, including some of my favourites. If wanting to be happy and enjoying life is the lowest they ever got, then Theon wouldn’t have suffered years of torture and Stannis wouldn’t be dead (he didn’t have his supplies guarded and he sacrificed his daughter for slightly warmer temperature), Cersei wouldn’t have lost her son (after arming the Faith Militant), etc.
